Game Overview.Actions: Each player can play one or many cards on any of the three available locations per turn
Game Overview.Victory Condition: Player with the highest total power at two of the three locations wins

Locations.Reveal: One location revealed at start, others revealed on turns two and three

Properties.Energy Cost: Amount of energy required to play
Properties.Ability: Special effect (not all cards have abilities)

Match.Energy: Starts at 1 on turn 1, increases by 1 each turn
Match.Victory Condition: Highest total power at two of the three locations

Cosmic Cubes.Win Reward: Winner receives cosmic cubes for competitive rank

Snap.Effect: Doubles cosmic cubes available to win (or lose)

Retreat.Effect: Allows player to retreat from match, losing current number of cosmic cubes
